“I’m going to run it this time,” Caleb commanded in the huddle.

“I’m not telling you what coach said. I’m telling you what I’m doing. I’m going to run the ball right and I dare any of those pricks to try and tackle me.”

The boys stood in silent frustration before taking their spots. Sure enough, Caleb ran the ball this time and when the first lineman tried to tackle Caleb, it barely slowed him down. The coach blew his whistle. “Johnson! That was not the play we discussed!”

The lineman backed away as Coach Walter approached. His stone expression didn’t move. “Practice the play’s Johnson,” he demanded.

“Whatever,” Caleb huffed, stomping back to his spot.

The coach blew the whistle again. “Hit the showers everyone!”

The field of teenagers relaxed and immediately turned back to the building.

“Except you, Johnson,” the coach finished.

Coach Walter’s approached with unexpected speed. He dug his heels into the grass with each heavy step. “What was that son?”

“This!” he stabbed. “I’m used to attitude from star players, but something has gotten into you today.”

“Maybe I’m just realizing my full potential,” Caleb slung back.

“No one person is as good as a team, son,” he enunciated each word with poignancy. “I do not care how big you are or how strong you are or how talented you are---”

Coach Walter’s gaze crained higher as Caleb moved closer, but never flinched. “Take tomorrow off, Johnson. You need to consider what it means to be on a team. No one. And I mean no one is better than anyone else.”

Caleb’s eyes darkened. “So you say… coach.”

After several painful seconds of utter silence, Caleb broke first. The titan strode passed Coach Walters, purposefully grazing the old man’s shoulder against his tightly coiled arm. Mikey sat up in the stands, straining to read his science book under the cloudless twilight. Caleb approached the fence with his backpack limply hanging in one hand. “You ready shrimp?” he boomed.

"Shut up."

Caleb reached his free hand around and snapped his “tiny” shoulder pads off with a one easy pull. They fell lifelessly onto the track with a hard clunk.

And now his eyes were level with the middle of his back, rather than his shoulders.

“You been eating your Wheaties today, Caleb?”

“Not you too.”

“Not me too?” Mikey asked back.

“Everyone won’t shut up about how big I am today. That’s all the team could talk about.”

“Could it be because it’s true?”

“I’ve always been this big, Mikey.”

“Correction, you’ve been big for the past couple of years.”

“Mikey,” his voice darkened.

“You know what I mean. One minute you were a little bigger than me. The next you were a brick wall.”

“Puberty, man. Wonderful thing.”

“You were nicer then,” Mikey sighed under his breath.

The two boys rounded a corner of the building and entered the parking lot. Mikey mindlessly scrapped one hand against the rough, tan painted cinderblock. Their car was one of the few left in the whole place, bathed in an unappealing, buzzing yellow light.

Mikey broke the silence once again. “I’ve been through puberty and nothing like that happened!”

“Correction: you are going through puberty, and you are a shrimp because you will always be a shrimp,” Caleb replied with a matter-of-fact tone.

Caleb tensed as he opened the driver door, “I already told you once, dick.”

“All I’m saying is,” Mikey took a breath before hopping into the passenger seat, “You just look a lot bigger today.”

“And don’t you forget it,” Caleb wheezed.

Caleb’s oversized body dwarfed the driver’s seat. Plastic and glass constricted him on all sides. His knees crunched up, pinned in place by the steering wheel and his swollen chest. Caleb’s quads flexed into the solid slabs, fighting to unfold the bound titan. He squeezed his oversized arm between the door and seat, fingering for the latch.

Mike watched Caleb’s struggle with amusement. “Need some help there big guy?”

Click.

The seat slide back several inches, locking into place with a loud BANG. Although Caleb was still tightly confined, his knees dropped to the bottom of the steering wheel.

Caleb revved the engine to life unblinking and eyes forward, finally responding to his shrimpy little brother.

“Never.”

Caleb immediately looked up and raised his eyebrow.

The following morning, Xan and Mikey were still in bed when Julie opened the bedroom door. Both boys woke up when Julie quietly walked up to Mikey. Mikey was already away as well.

"I'll be home early with a big surprise for you two boys! Now you two be good!" Julie said to Mikey as she got up and walked over to Xan's bed.

"Hey Daniel! You're such a good boy! I want you to stay with us!" she whispered to him.

"Yes, ma'am!" he replied politely. He already knew what was going to happen but for Mikey it was going to be a complete surprise.

"So are you two going to the pool today?" Julie asked them.

"Yeah! We're going swimming all day!" Mikey said impatiently. "So, what's the surprise? Are you bringing pizza?"

"Oh the surprise is bigger than that!" Julie grinned as she grabbed her bag and walked out the door.

An hour later, the boys got up and had cereal for breakfast. Then, they put on their Speedos, they grabbed their towels and they put on sandals before heading over to the pool at the YMCA which was just a block from their house.

Once they arrived there they just jumped in the pool and they splashed around in the water all morning and all afternoon long, jumping from the diving board and swimming around in the pool until they were dead tired and very hungry.

Of course, Xan quietly added another two inches to Mikey, making the boy grow to 5 ft 7 inches tall and adding a little more muscle to him, in anticipation to the big announcement.

That evening, when they were back at the house watching TV in the living room, Julie came home with Caleb, who had just returned from football practice.

Caleb took time to shower and get dressed while Julie prepared and cut the slices of pizza for the two boys, who were starving. Then she sat down on the couch next to the two boys just as Caleb sat down on the big recliner in front of the TV set.

"I have an announcement to make!" Julie said out loud. "I spoke with Daniel's parents. They have been re-assigned to work in the Middle East for the State Department for the next ten years and they don't want to drag Daniel with them because of safety reasons. So, I spoke with an attorney and I have here Daniel's adoption papers, ready to sign! It went very quick and easy but as of now, Dan will be Mike's little brother!"

"Yay!" Mikey cheered out loud.

"Say what?" Caleb gasped.

"Awesome!" Xan said as he gave Mikey a big hug.

"Caleb! Daniel is now your little brother! He's not leaving anymore!" Julie said with a huge smile on her face.

"What? But... How... What???" Caleb stuttered.

"We're brothers!" Mikey cheered, as he almost started crying tears of joy as Caleb looked on in complete disbelief!

What was going to happen next?

1333.content:
"Taller," Xan said, resting his palms and fingertips together. When Arnold's face responded by twisting ever so slightly with skepticism, an impish grin spread across the superior being's lips. "You look puzzled. Don't you believe me?"

"Not to be rude, sir," Arnold replied, pushing the rim of his glasses to the back of his nose, "but frankly, would YOU believe you?"

Xan stroked his chin thoughtfully and laughed, "I think I like you." With a simple gesture, Arnold's textbook snapped through the air and into Xan's hand. "Oh child, this material is beneath you," he said, browsing its pages with a disapproving shake of his head, "I can sense your intellect. Why do you fear failure? You hold yourself up to such an irregular standard."

Arnold blinked, his expression melting into an insulted smirk. "Child?" he scoffed, as if to point out Xan's own, even more youthful appearance, "What would you know about it?"

"Really? You're going to doubt the intuitive capability of a being who appears at will and can take your property through telekinesis? Even a boy as logical as you, witnessing what you've just witnessed, must realize there's more to this earthly plane than meets the eye. I've demonstrated my power."

Arnold considered this for a moment and gave a stiff shrug. "Well, you do use big words..."

"I'll take that as a good enough compromise! Well then," Xan said, smiling triumphantly, "As I already said, friend, you have been chosen -- your days of meekness, at this very moment, end. The spindly wimp before me shall become a lordly stud. But! Surely, a lad as well-versed as yourself in history knows there is no such thing as a free lunch. I do have conditions. Fortunately for you, my condition is in a way another blessing. There's a boy who's humiliated you, dominated you publicly, made you retreat into your books and studying."

"Caleb," Arnold said, practically gritting his teeth.

"Right." Even then, Xan could sense Arnold's fury boiling, and he felt certain he'd chosen the right mark. "I want you to visit upon him twice the humiliation he's shown you, in whatever manner you see fit. Get creative with it. Have fun. I'll be watching."

"Wait a second!" Arnold exclaimed, his skepticism suddenly all but vanished as he entertained the possibility of revenge, "Why are you doing this?"

Xan laughed as he started to fade away, "Does it matter?" And with that, he was gone.

"Ah... My history book....."

As he stared into the vacant air, Arnold considered the possibility, as any logical person would, that what he'd just experienced was either a dream or hallucination. He was too timid to try drugs, so that wasn't it, and he wasn't particularly exhausted by stress. Was he dreaming, then? He felt conscious. Was there a gas leak somewhere? After a moment of pondering this, he began to feel a warmth filling him, accompanied by something else. He'd helped his uncle move once, and the day after his unused muscles felt like they were on fire. This was like that, except instead of that painful, half-paralyzed stiffness, he felt surprisingly good.

The top button on his black-and-white patterned shirt popped, causing Arnold to realize just how tight his clothes had become. Could the puckish creature's promise be real? Quickly, he moved to undo the rest of his buttons before his shirt was ruined, when to his amazement he spied something he never thought he'd see through the plain white undershirt beneath -- definition. What had been a boring plateau of pale skin now gave way to the early formations of what were undoubtedly very real pectoral muscles. "No way..." he gasped, running his fingers along the newly tightened abdominals forming before his eyes.

Arnold's typical height of 5'8" fostered an envy in him toward the much more admired and successful sports players in school. Not only was he suddenly among their stature, he was on the verge of surpassing the tallest of them! With a giddy laugh, he lifted up his shirt to witness first-hand the changes. His pressed khakis conformed to the bulging muscles in his thighs, and were certain to give if his growth continued. Nearing 7', the former nerd was, to say the least, as studly as Xan said he'd be. Arnold had always had bookish good looks, but for the first time in his youth, he could honestly say he was smoking hot!

"This is really me," Arnold mused aloud. Even his voice startled him, an octave deeper and full of something he'd sincerely lacked: confidence.

Xan's promise fulfilled, Arnold knew he had a responsibility of his own to follow through on. The next day at school could not come soon enough.

What happens next?

Caleb was pleased to see his mother already at work in the kitchen making breakfast for him.
After wolfing everything, he stood up and went to his room, without thanking his mother for all her work.
Going to his room, he passed near his father... And he felt that something was not right. He couldn't describe the sensation, so he just shrugged and went to get ready for school.

But at school he felt again that strange sensation, especially when he was near somebody. Again, the shrugged off the sensation: why bother about it when you are the alpha? Maybe it was only envy. He was the biggest and most muscular one; everybody should be envy of him.
Without thinking anymore about that, he went on and then returned home, after a stop to the gym.

But during the week this strange sensation was always there, around him like an aura. Every time, when he was near somebody he could feel it there, stronger and stronger.

The sensation he was feeling was the start of Xan's revenge. He was proud being the biggest one? Not anymore. Xan was literally enlarging humankind, making it taller. Everybody, except Caleb. He started slow, less than an inch per day. After a week, everybody would 6 inches taller, then 1 foot, 2 feet and so on, till Caleb changes his mind.

After a week, Caleb noticed (finally) these changes; he wasn't towering as usual above his family: his father was 6'1, his mother 5'11, and his little bratty brother 5'6. He was still the bigger one, but the size disparity was reducing quite fast. Even at school he wasn't the biggest anymore: there were some students taller than him, reaching and surpassing 7 feet mark in height, his girlfriend was as tall as him. The shortest one was a 6'3 student. Now the average height in the US was 6'4, Caleb now was a perfect average student.
The strangest thing was that anybody wasn't noticing anything. He hoped this growth thing end soon. He couldn't bear the idea of becoming the smallest one ever.

Unfortunately for him, he was only the beginning. Xan made the growth accelerate: now everybody would grow more than an inch per day.

The third day after the "growth-acceleration", Caleb saw his fear come real. Now his father was taller (again) than him at 6'6.The fifth day, it was his mother's turn to surpass him, and the seventh day his stupid brother became 6'6. Now he was the shortest one his family.
At school it was even worse. With the average height of 7'4 in US, Caleb became the dwarf of the school. There were lots of students already 8 feet tall and taller, his girlfriend now stood 7'5. Even the principal, a really short woman now stood 6'6. And still nobody didn't notice anything. everything was changing too to accommodate this bigger beings.
When he tried to talk with his girlfriend about it, he only received a hug and a kiss on his head. "You shouldn't feel ashamed about your height Caleb, I love you just the way you are". He noticed that everybody was friendlier with him, maybe because they were feeling pity about his short stature?
At the end of the week His father was 7'1, his mother 6'11 and his brother 6'6. Why was it happening to him? Now he couldn't do anything, he had to obey again to his parents rules, like making breakfast for himself, wash dishes sometimes after meals. His girlfriend was becoming more dominant, deciding everything about their sexual life and everything else.

He was losing every bit of power he had. The only thing remaining bigger than usual was his muscles. At the gym he as still going strong, lifting more than some 7'7 guys. 14112.content:
"Yeah! I know what to do!" Xan was really excited now, he had had a really wonderful idea.

Caleb woke up feeling really strange. looking around, he saw that his room was changed.It was bigger, way bigger! he was already sweating: how big everybody got now? But other things were different: the door was bigger, at least 12 feet; not only taller but way wider, like made to fit two "before changes" bodybuilders together. his trophies disappeared totally, all his workout gear gone.
"What the fuck? Mom where are you?" Shouted Caleb, maybe his mom could help about this, even that he was scared to see her even bigger.
"Coming! Don't shout or you'll wake up your brother!!" Better follow that advice, Now that he was the bigger one, he should be really careful; his parents could be understanding, his brother not.

While waiting, he pepped outside his room and received a really big shock: in his parents room he saw an enormous man, dressed in a really stretched business-suit. It was stretched not only because he was 10 feet tall or more, but he was fucking muscular! His back was filled with muscles, his lats were pushing outside enormous arms, his thighs like oak trunks (and the left one was slight bigger, why?).
Caleb was going to piss himself if not for a female voice calling behind him
"I'm here honey, what do you need?" Turning around, he saw in front of a 10-pack, with equally hard obliques, jutting out for an inch; looking down, he saw enormous legs, with muscles fighting for space. Afraid of look up, and when he did it he saw only boobs, big ones; perky and going out for half a foot, threatening to destroy the small top holding them. He couldn't speak.
"Hey, are you all right?" Said his mother, while lowering herself, to let her son looking right at her face.
This enormous being was his mother? It was too much, he fainted and pissed himself.

Meanwhile, Xan was having the time of his life. It was too much fun!!! He was quite a good thing losing the bet. Caleb was so easy to torment.

After a while, Caleb woke up, hoping that it was only a worse nightmares than usual. It wasn't.
In front of him there was his family and his girlfriend. His father was the businessman he already saw before, 10'1 feet tall; her mother was 9'11; his younger brother (little wasn't appropriate now) 9'6. His girlfriend was the biggest, 10'5. Like his parents, everybody was freaking muscular. That's why everything was a lot bigger and wider. He noticed also a thing about their clothing. Everybody was concerned about him, except his brother, looking at him with a mocking grin.

"Don't talk like that you jerk, it's my boyfriend you're talking about!" Cindy, Caleb's girlfriend, replied while giving him a jack hammer slap. But she apologized: "Sorry Mr&Mrs Johnson, I overreacted"
"Don't worry about that, he deserved it" replied gently his mom "and besides, you give better slaps. you are more muscular than my small 35-inch biceps"

"Small?" Caleb couldn't believe it. Her mother was small? So the rest of the world?
Later, Caleb recovered totally, but discovered that now he wasn't going to school anymore because of the bullies, and also because sometimes other students were knocking out while walking because of his small stature; And also everybody was naturally this big. Gyms, exercise equipment never existed.

Caleb was desperate,now he was an useless piece of the society now, even though his parents and girlfriend were trying to help him and cheer him up.
He was really depressed. and thought of finishing his life.
One night, he managed to get a knife; at midnight, he was going to kill when Xan appeared.
"This is not what I wanted!" while making disappear the knife.

What's going to happen now?

141121.content:
Caleb couldn't believe his eyes, he just saw a little man appear and vanish the knife he took for end his life.
But this man was familiar; He was the man Caleb saw before everybody become a giant, the man talking about interdimensional beings and revenge for a bet about him.
He put the pieces together; It was all his fault!!
"Yes, I am the one who is messing with you, changing everybody into a mountain of muscles, making you feel inferior" Xan answered, after reading Caleb's thoughts.
"And it was fun, seeing you losing day after day your status of big man, trying to comprehend why everybody was getting taller except you, seeing that even the dwarf principal was taller than you. Trying to resist because you were still strong, and then you weren't considered strong anymore. But now It went too far, and seeing that you were trying to kill yourself Is enough to make me stop messing with you. I'm not an evil interdimensional being."

"So, now you're gonna make everything back to normal?" Caleb was felling happy; the nightmare has come to an end.
"Back? This is normal now. I said I will stop to mess with you; It means that I will not touch anything else." Replied Xan with a smirk.
This for Caleb was like being shot, stabbed, punched in the balls; all together: an eternal life reduced like a inferior being? He was surely joking.
"I never joke about that. Don't worry, you'll be fine. I will made sure that your girlfriend will always be loyal to you. And also don 't even think about suicide; every attempt will be vain." With these words, Xan vanished.

Caleb remained some moment still like a statue, processing what he has just heard. Forever like this, a dwarf in a society of bodybuilder giants? He fell down, and started crying freely.
"Please" he started talking to Xan like he was still with him between sobs "I don't want to remain like this, I am a doll in the hands of my family. I understood my mistakes, I must respect everybody and don't judge anybody by size. I will do anything; please, make reality return to normal, I will do anything. I am completely honest, I'm not bribing you."
Seeing that It wasn't happening anything, Caleb tried again to kill himself: The knife morphed in a flower while it was touching his chest.
At the end, Caleb could only go to bed, trying to sleep and preparing himself for his life as a dwarf.
Fortunately for him, Xan was listening to him. Feeling his honest change of heart, he reconsidered his previous statement: "after all, I've made my point; let's make him a bit happy, but I make sure he will remember about this experience and also he will never go back to his old behavior" And he started again making the final changes to Caleb's reality.

Next day, Caleb woke up sad, remembering Xan's words of yesterday night.
But when he got up from the bed, he felt that again something was different: looking around, he saw that his trophies were back (some was missing thought), his workout gear was back, and the doors was back to normal size.
It was a good sight! Xan listened to his pleas and return everything back to normal. He was so happy, that he failed to noticed that his photos of family and friends weren't back to normal, but he was going to discover these differences soon.
On his desk, he found a note from Xan. "Yesterday night you showed me that you were really sorry, so I've returned everything to normal. Well, quite everything. You still need some reminder about what I can do. Farewell, my lost bet."

Everything back to normal? Caleb was too happy. He rushed down to the kitchen, happy to be again the bigger one, and found the first reminder: his mother. She wasn't back to normal; smaller then the 10 ft behemoth he saw yesterday, but stil really big. Xan gave him mentally her measurements:
6'5 feet tall, 270 pounds of muscles,big boobs jutting out for a foot thanks also to her meaty pecs, 22 inch biceps, 8-pack, etc... She was as tall as Caleb but wider (and bustier). Caleb stopped in front of her, frozen-like. Her mother, unsure about what to do, went near him and touched his hand "Are you alright? It seems you saw a ghost"
Recovering from the surprise, Caleb hugged her without saying anything. He didn't care that her mother was a bit bigger. Surprised, her mother returned his hug: " ok, big guy, what do you need?" "Nothing mom, just wanna hug you for a bit" "Well, that's a new thing, But I'm not complaining". The hug lasted for some minutes, and they were interrupted by Mickey, Caleb's brother and second reminder.
Now Caleb's brother was 6'4, and 200 pounds, smaller than Caleb for now, because Mickey Was going through puberty (a fierce one, said Xan) and he was still growing ( probably he will reach 7'3 and more than 350 pounds of muscles, he will be the biggest bodybuilder ever).
"Aww, big bro needs some affection? so cute" But Caleb didn't react, he resisted the temptation, and started eating breakfast made by her mom. It was time for the third reminder: his dad.
He was 6'8 feet tall, 230 pounds and fit like an Olympic swimmer, with something really (REALLY) big stuffed in his underwear (gotta keep your mother happy, said Xan). But Caleb didn't care anymore. Better having 6'9 parents than 10 feet tall ones.

After breakfast, he went to school to find his final reminders: his girlfriend and his friends.
It seemed that all his friends received a big increase in muscle mass; some of them, even if shorter than him, were outlifting him with ease. And now he was the second tallest of his group.
Xan made a new friend for Caleb: He was Samuel, the nerdy, scrawny kid always bullied by Caleb. He still had the nerd face, but now that face was put on a 6'9 feet tall, 290 pounds iper-muscular body, with something really big in his underwear, like his father.
Also everybody at school was 2 inches taller and fitter, but his girlfriend was obviously different.
She was 7'5 feet tall (jokingly called Sequoia girl at school), 300 pounds of muscles, 25 inch biceps, shoulder so big that Caleb could sit on them, wide lats pushing her arms out, 8 rock hard abs, meaty thigh bigger than Caleb's torso, enormous calves. She was virtually fat-free, except the two heavy, perky orbs that were her boobs, so big that when she was hugging Caleb, they engulfed his head, making it disappear. She still had the proportion and the grace of a female, only enlarged.

Thanks to these reminders (after a month Mickey was already bigger than him), Caleb continued his life without bullying anymore, helping people, and becoming the guy Xan bet him to be in the past.

Caleb felt great when he woke up the next morning. He sat up in bed and took a moment to admire his perfect body. After a few minutes of flexing, he headed downstairs to get ready for school. His parents both went to work early every morning, so it was up to Caleb to make sure his little brother, Mikey, went to school on time.

Mikey was a lot like Caleb looks wise, but other than that that they were completely different. Mikey was about 12 and was super thin.

At least, that's what Caleb had thought.

When Caleb went downstairs he saw rather large replicas of all his furniture. "The hell is this.." he said to himself.

"You know mom hates it when you cuss." a voice boomed from across the room. Caleb turned to see his once little brother eating ceral at the table. Mikey was now literally twice Caleb's size. Mikey was 13 feet tall now, and each of his muscles were double what Caleb's were.

"M-Mikey? What the hell happened to you?" Caleb stammered. "Don't cuss! And I don't know what you're talking about. Nothing's any different that it was yesterday." "But you're so...big!" "No. I'm normal for my age. Besides, if anyone in this house is at a wierd height for their age it's you, shorty!" Mikey laughed as he spoke. "Anyways, I'm done with breakfast now. Drive me to school! I've already got the phonebooks set up so you can see over the steering wheel, shorty!"

Caleb was shocked. This was all normal? It sure as hell wasn't yesterday. Did that Xan guy really do something to his life? If so, then Caleb's life was truely about to become a living hell.

1422.content:
Caleb briefly considered rummaging through the ground level cabinets for breakfast until he heard Mikey smack the car horn outside and realized he had no appetite or time for it anyway. He got his notably heavier book bag and went to the car, wondering how on Earth he was going to drive them to school if the car was proportionally over-sized as everything else in his imposing new world, and when he found out, it was almost as much a surprise as his initial take of this world had been. Almost.

A half-dozen small but thick books had been crudely tied in a stack to each of the pedals, with several more on the seat as height-boosters. Caleb’s brother looked at him expectantly from across the driver’s seat in the passenger’s side, waiting for him to jump up and be the chauffeur. Caleb slowly did so, climbing up a stack including Ivanhoe and War And Peace to sit on a few encyclopedia volumes, but all Caleb could think blankly for ten straight seconds was that there was no way this could possibly work.

In fact, it did work, but even as he pulled in to the parking lot between their respective schools and his brother bailed out with a glancing “bye,” he couldn’t have said how. It was like some instinct had driven him to go through the motions naturally, no pun intended. He’d had no trouble navigating the wheel twice the size of a hula hoop or the turn signal the length of a walking stick. Even as he’d pushed down abnormally hard on the books to break and accelerate, he still found the feeling strangely familiar. That worried him, but Caleb eventually put it out of his mind- he’d think about it later. He didn’t want to get comfy in this world as a runt.
He needed to talk to someone about it, and the one he wanted to talk to the most right now was his girlfriend and lover, Karen. He walked through the teeming mass of tall people, trying to ignore a couple of rude snickers, comments and glances from the 17-foot monsters, and found her right where her usual clique resided before the first bell, just beside and outside the front doors.

She had never looked so sexy.

Her uniform had always had a way of accentuating her chest with admirable detail, but the creature she had become was another matter entirely. Her arms and calves were toned to a perfect balance, being defined and well-developed without being over-sized or bulky. Her thighs stood out as strong and broad without being overblown, and a modest set of abs could be seen with a squint through the rather thin school-mandated uniform shirt- all of which were accompanied by an IMmodestly huge, perky, athletic set of breasts. If they hadn’t been on a body with such astounding musculature, Caleb would’ve said they looked like they were too large to carry.

She was hanging out with several other Amazonian girls Caleb recognized only by face. One of them pointed Caleb out to Karen. (This girl seemed to make a comment of which Caleb didn't hear much, only "...looking at you.") When it became clear she couldn't ignore you without being rude, she turned and gave an awkward grin.

"Uh... Can I help you with something?"
"Hey, Karen. Do you remember me?"
"Pardon me, but is there some reason I should? And how do you know my name?"
Caleb's smile faltered. "Yeah... I'm Caleb. I'm your boyfriend, we were going out."
Karen's little clique of girlfriends burst into tittering, stifled giggles at this. Karen herself had a little more poise, and she covered her mouth as she huffed out a quick chuckle. Then she saw how seriously Caleb was looking at her.
"Look... ah, Caleb? I'm sorry, but I think I'd remember going out with you. You kind of... stand out."
At this, the Karen's giggling friends gave up on subtlety and burst into full laughter. Caleb's heart sunk in his chest. Comments about an inter-dimensional being changing reality around him weren't going to exactly bolster trust.
"Look, Karen... I know this is weird. I get it. But you've gotta believe me- up until last night, when the… when things changed, we were dating, and I can prove-"
BRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRING! At that point, the bell went off for first class. Karen's posse gave their scattered goodbyes while Karen tossed her backpack over her shoulder.
"Sorry, Caleb, but I gotta go."
"No- wait!"
Already, those long legs of hers were striding away. Other people were crossing his field of vision, their sizable bulks and overblown statures cutting him off. He was about to lose her. Caleb called out in desperation.
"You were born, August 22, 1997! You have two brothers who drive you nuts, one older, one younger- Aaron can’t act his age, and Jacob can’t stop!”
The crowd was dispersing. Caleb saw that she had stopped. His heart lifted- had he gotten through to her?
“You have a tiny cluster of moles under your right armpit that look like Mickey Mouse.”
She had turned around. She was coming back towards him. Caleb closed his eyes and released a sigh of relief.
“You have an interest in-“
BOOM.

It happened in an instant. Caleb didn’t even see the motions. One second, he had been calming himself down, the next, his feet were off the ground, his back was against the lockers, and he was struggling to breathe. Karen had grabbed him around the neck, lifted him off the ground, and pinned him against the wall, all with one hand. Caleb was looking down her powerfully built arm at a face that was clearly not amused. Those strong, beautiful muscles of hers suddenly looked a lot less attractive and a lot more dangerous.
"Listen here, you creepy little midget. I don't know how you know those things, but if you've been stalking me, I suggest you drop it. If I catch you spying on me again, I'm going to make you pay for it, and I don't mean in cash."
And in another instant, her grip was released, and Caleb collapsed, confused and gasping, on the over-sized checkerboard tile floor. Karen quickly strode away through the emptied hallway without a backwards glance, leaving Caleb to his thoughts.

143.content:
When Caleb woke up in his bed the next morning, for some reason he felt as if something was...off. Sitting up, he rubbed the sand out his eyes and looked around, trying to figure out what made him think that. As far as his eyes could tell him, everything was pretty much the same. All of his stuff was still there, his weights, his posters, his shelves full of trophies and photos. But something still felt...different.

"Caleb, Mikey, breakfast is ready!" Caleb's mom called from downstairs.

Caleb shook his head, jumping out of bed to get ready for the day. It was probably just some figment of his imagination, like how he his mind made him think that some kid could appear and disappear in his room in the blink of an eye. As he got dressed, however, that feeling that something was off returned, however the rumbling in his stomach made him push it out of his mind. Maybe if he got some food in him he wouldn't be thinking that something is wrong when it's not.

When Caleb got downstairs and walked into the kitchen, he was greeted by a table loaded with food. There was at least twice as many food as usual, piled high and pipping hot.

"Whoa mom, why did you cook so much? You really went all out today." Caleb said as he sat in his seat.

"What are you talking about, it takes a lot of food to feed you growing boys, especially your brother." Caleb's mom said as she set down the carton of orange juice on the table. "Cooking food for you both feels like another full time job."

"Oh come on, it's not like the shrimp is gonna grow much." Caleb laughed.

Suddenly Caleb felt himself get lifted into the air, something big and hard wrapping itself around his neck and crushing his windpipe.

"And who is the shrimp around here?"

Caleb's eyes bulged out even more. His little brother, who used to be half his size, now towered over him. The hard thing that was crushing his neck was Mikey's now thick and muscular arm! Caleb tried to break free, but Mikey held him tight.

"Looks like someone needs to be taught a lesson about whose the big man around here!" Mikey laughed as he noogied Caleb, messing up his "older" brother's hair.

"Mikey, put him down and eat breakfast." Their mom said with a sigh. "Just because you're bigger doesn't mean you have to torture him."

"Yes mom." Mikey dropped Caleb onto the floor. Caleb gasped as he finally got a good look at his brother. Mikey had somehow grown into a giant! He stood 6'8" tall and with the biggest muscles he had ever seen, even bigger than the bodybuilders in his magazines! His arms filled the sleeves of the puny shirt he was wearing, though those shirts must've been 3-4XL! He must've weighed 320 lbs, and yet looking at the veins that pulsed underneath the skin Caleb had to say there wasn't much fat on him, if there were any! his pecs jutted out half a foot from his chest, and his jeans were so tight that Caleb could see every head of those massive tree trunk quads.

"M-Mikey, how the hell did you grow so big!?" Caleb asked.

"I ate my wheaties and lifted." Mikey grinned as he flexed his arm. The huge bicep swelled bigger and bigger until riiiiiiip the sleeve tore apart to make room for the 25 inch gun.

"Mikey! How many times have I told you not to rip your clothes!" Their mom said.

"Sorry mom, it's hard when I just keep on growing!" Mikey laughed.

Caleb looked between his mom and his huge not-so-little brother. Why was his mom acting so normal? From what he was hearing, it was as if Mikey was always this big!

Suddenly Caleb realized what gave him that uncomfortable feeling that morning. His room, even though looked the same, wasn't. His weights were smaller and worn out, his posters were all torn and messed up and his trophies...now that he thought about it, there seemed to be a lot less. And his clothes...looking down, Caleb discovered that instead of his usual tight fitting muscle tees and jeans he was wearing baggier clothes, and Caleb recognized the pattern on the shirt as Mikey's, yet supersized! he was wearing Mikey's old clothes, but somehow, they were all made for the new, bigger Mikey!

As impossible as it seemed, Caleb was now in a reality where he was no longer the "bigger" brother, but Mikey was!

info.brief_description: What happens when a jock causes an all powerful being to lose a bet?
info.description:
Caleb was a muscle headed jock who used his size to push people around. However, his arrogance has caused an omnipotent being to lose a bet, and now his life is going to become a little....bigger.

This interactive is focused around various forms of growth such as muscle, height, etc. No death/toilet/vore stuff, but some violence and aggression is okay.
